version_description: We added an ability to get notified about new templates, fixed some bugs, and added an option to subscribe for the all 162 templates for the less price.

— Fixed bugs
— Minor UI improvements
— Premium templates icon much obvious
— Ability to report an error

Follow us on Instagram @500stories

New Templates!
Enjoy the new hand-crafted Camellia templates!

Also, we made several stability improvements to make the app more reliable for you.

We added an ability to save a story as an image as well as save a story without animation. All up to you. 
Also, we fixed the crash during saving a story
— Minor bugfix

— Stability improvements
— Templates polishing

Follow us on Instagram @500Stories

We've extended the capabilities of the editor! Now you can move all the elements, rotate, and change everything as you like!
Moreover, all your stories are saved in one place, on "My Stories" tab. You can view and edit them anytime!

Follow the news on our Instagram @ 500stories

Now you can add animated GIFs, emojis, texts, and stickers from the huge collection of GIPHY to the templates!
Also, hundreds of stickers from existing templates are available to you!
With 500 Stories, you have even more opportunities for creativity and inspiration!

Subscribe to our Instagram @ 500stories

38 new templates for Instagram Posts!
Change the size of any template! Now you can create not only stories but also posts in 1:1 or 4:5 ratio, as well as change the format of any template up to your taste!
New export option: share your story as a post into your Insta feed
